decoworld.editor.gui

Class EditorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.editor.gui.EditorModel

  • public class EditorModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The model for the Editor. Mainly handles instance-wide specifics such as TileSets.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String m_sDefaultTileSet

    • Field Detail

      • m_sDefaultTileSet

        public static final java.lang.String m_sDefaultTileSet
        The name of the default TileSet. The editor will fail to load if this doesn't exist.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Get a TileSetWrapper by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the TileSet.
